methods.Synopsis: Get rooms

parameters.Name: destination
parameters.Description: Name of the destination to search in, Either destination or destination_id are required

parameters.Name: destination_id
parameters.Description: ID of the destination to search in. Either destination or destination_id are required

parameters.Name: ids
parameters.Description: ID of rooms to search in. Comma-separated string of room ids

parameters.Name: check_in
parameters.Description: ISO 8601 (YYYY-MM-DD) format date of the check-in date. If this is specified, check_out is required

parameters.Name: check_out
parameters.Description: ISO 8601 (YYYY-MM-DD) format date of the check-out date. If this is specified, check_in is required

parameters.Name: num_guests
parameters.Description: Number of guests to search for

parameters.Name: room_types
parameters.Description: Filter on comma-separated list of available room types. See the list of room types under enumerables

parameters.Name: amenities
parameters.Description: Filter on comma-separated list of available amenities. See the list of amenities under enumerables

parameters.Name: order
parameters.Description: Ordering, possible values are: recently_active, price_asc, price_desc

parameters.Name: limit
parameters.Description: Number of results to return, defaults to 10 if not specified, maximum of 100 (specify a page parameter if you need more)

parameters.Name: since
parameters.Description: ISO 8601 (YYYY-MM-DD) format date or Unix time in seconds. Adding this parameter will only return records updated after this time.

parameters.Name: currency
parameters.Description: Currency code for conversion or the resulting pricing

parameters.Name: format
parameters.Description: Output format as JSON or XML

methods.Synopsis: Get the rooms that have been updated since an specified date

parameters.Name: since
parameters.Description: Return rooms updated after this date until now. ISO 8601 (YYYY-MM-DD). Max: 1 week ago. Default: 1 week ago

parameters.Name: limit
parameters.Description: Number of rooms per page. (Default: 10, Max: 100)

parameters.Name: format
parameters.Description: Output format as JSON or XML

parameters.Name: currency
parameters.Description: Currency code for conversion or the resulting pricing

parameters.Name: strip_html
parameters.Description: Strip html tags out of property descriptions

parameters.Description: Output format as JSON or XML

methods.Synopsis: Get availability and rates for this property. Calling it without start_date or end_date will return availability date for the upcoming month. Calling it with since will only return the availabilities that were updated since then.

parameters.Name: start_date
parameters.Description: Start date for the availability period to fetch. Must be after today. Format: YYYY-MM-DD

parameters.Name: end_date
parameters.Description: Start date for the availability period to fetch. Format: YYYY-MM-DD

parameters.Name: currency
parameters.Description: Currency code for conversion or the resulting pricing

parameters.Name: since
parameters.Description: ISO 8601 (YYYY-MM-DD) format date or Unix time in seconds. Adding this parameter will only return records updated after this time. Useful for synchronizing availability.

parameters.Name: filter
parameters.Description: Filter only the available or unavailable availability records

parameters.Name: format
parameters.Description: Output format as JSON or XML

methods.Synopsis: Price Check

parameters.Name: currency
parameters.Description: Currency code for conversion or the resulting pricing

parameters.Name: format
parameters.Description: Output format as JSON or XML

methods.Synopsis: Get price information for multiple rooms in the same API call. Useful when rendering a search results page, passing the IDs of all rooms in the page, to get the accurate price. The `accurate` flag in the response indicates if the price is live or not. If the price is not live, `accurate` will be set to false, causing it to be updated in the background. A subsequent call should therefore include accurate price.

parameters.Name: currency
parameters.Description: Currency code for conversion or the resulting pricing

methods.Synopsis: Register a new user account on Roomorama. This call does not require you to be authenticated with OAuth. If you do pass a valid authorization header, the newly created user account will automatically be linked to the caller user account for the purpose of referral bonus calculation. Additionally we will directly generate an access token for the new user account which will be returned as part of the response.

parameters.Name: image_url
parameters.Description: URL to remote image for upload of profile picture

parameters.Name: format
parameters.Description: Output format as JSON or XML

methods.Synopsis: Update a inquiry under this host account specified by the id parameter. Please note that you can only edit inquiry details while the inquiry has not been paid for. The inquiry will also be blocked from updating if the guest has displayed the check-out page in the last 30 minutes.

parameters.Name: num_guests
parameters.Description: Number of guests indicated in inquiry

parameters.Name: subtotal
parameters.Description: Change the base rental fee for the inquiry

parameters.Name: tax_amount
parameters.Description: Amount of tax charged on the inquiry

parameters.Name: extra_guests_surcharge
parameters.Description: Extra guest surcharge charged on the inquiry

parameters.Name: additional_fee
parameters.Description: Additional misc. fees charged on the inquiry

parameters.Name: format
parameters.Description: Output format as JSON or XML

methods.Synopsis: Confirm availability for an inquiry specified by the id parameter. If the inquiry is an express booking, the booking will be confirmed.

parameters.Name: message
parameters.Description: Message to send to the guest

parameters.Name: format
parameters.Description: Output format as JSON or XML

methods.Synopsis: Decline availability for an inquiry specified by the id parameter. If the inquiry is an express booking, it will be cancelled. This currently does not work for bookings that have already been paid for.

parameters.Description: Message to send to the guest

parameters.Name: format
parameters.Description: Output format as JSON or XML

methods.Synopsis: List of all your properties

parameters.Name: format
parameters.Description: Output format as JSON or XML

methods.Synopsis: Get the property data for a property under this host account specified by the id parameter.

parameters.Name: format
parameters.Description: Output format as JSON or XML

methods.Synopsis: Create a new property using the post data defined. List of available amenities for the amenities field: https://roomorama.com/api/enumerables#amenities

parameters.Name: apartment_number
parameters.Description: Apartment number (required if property type is apartment)

parameters.Name: number_of_bedrooms
parameters.Description: Number of bedrooms, not required if property type is 'room'

parameters.Name: floor
parameters.Description: Floor on which the property is located

parameters.Name: amenities
parameters.Description: Comma-separated string of available amenities. Please check The list of available amenities for supported values

parameters.Name: minimum_stay
parameters.Description: Minimum length of stay in nights

parameters.Name: multi_unit
parameters.Description: Does this property have multiple units available?

parameters.Name: currency_code
parameters.Description: Currency code of the listing. Will default to the standard currency of the location you are listing in if not set. Please check the list of availble currencies for supported values

parameters.Name: security_deposit_type
parameters.Description: Security deposit type (one of 'cash', 'credit_card_auth', 'paypal') full list of deposit types

parameters.Name: rate_base_max_guests
parameters.Description: If this is set, the rates are based on this number of guests, any additional guests will incur surcharges defined in extra_guest_surcharge

parameters.Name: extra_guest_surcharge
parameters.Description: Nightly surcharge per guest over the rate_base_max_guests number

parameters.Name: default_to_available
parameters.Description: Availability mode, if this is set to true, the property will default to being available unless specified otherwise. If set to false it will only be available when specified

parameters.Name: cancellation_policy
parameters.Description: Roomorama Cancellation Policy that applies to this property. Defaults to 'standard'. Certified or Elite hosts have additonal Policy options.

parameters.Name: services_cleaning
parameters.Description: Cleaning service is available if set to true

parameters.Name: services_cleaning_rate
parameters.Description: Rate charged for this cleaning service

parameters.Name: services_cleaning_required
parameters.Description: Whether this service is required for every booking

parameters.Name: services_airport_pickup
parameters.Description: Airport pickup is available if set to true

parameters.Name: services_airport_pickup_rate
parameters.Description: Rate charged for this Airport pickup

parameters.Name: services_car_rental
parameters.Description: Car rental is available if set to true

parameters.Name: services_car_rental_rate
parameters.Description: Rate charged for this car rental

parameters.Name: services_concierge
parameters.Description: Concierge service is available if set to true

parameters.Name: services_concierge_rate
parameters.Description: Rate charged for this concierge service

parameters.Name: disabled
parameters.Description: If set to true this property will be hidden from the search

parameters.Name: instant_booking
parameters.Description: Whether the property supports instant confirmation via webhooks. Setting to `true` will only have effect if the account has properly set up the required webhooks.

parameters.Name: format
parameters.Description: Output format as JSON or XML

parameters.Description: Comma-separated list of amenities in this room. To clear all amenities pass any other string like 'none' as value

parameters.Name: rate_base_max_guests
parameters.Description: If this is set, the rates are based on this number of guests, any additional guests will incur surcharges defined in extra_guest_surcharge

parameters.Name: extra_guest_surcharge
parameters.Description: Nightly surcharge per guest over the rate_base_max_guests number

parameters.Name: default_to_available
parameters.Description: Availability mode, if this is set to true, the property will default to being available unless specified otherwise. If set to false it will only be available when specified

parameters.Name: cancellation_policy
parameters.Description: Roomorama Cancellation Policy that applies to this property. Defaults to 'standard'. Certified or Elite hosts have additonal Policy options.

parameters.Name: services_cleaning
parameters.Description: Cleaning service is available if set to true

parameters.Name: services_cleaning_rate
parameters.Description: Rate charged for this cleaning service

parameters.Name: services_cleaning_required
parameters.Description: Whether this service is required for every booking

parameters.Name: services_airport_pickup

parameters.Name: services_airport_pickup_rate
parameters.Description: Rate charged for this Airport pickup

parameters.Name: services_car_rental
parameters.Description: Car rental is available if set to true

parameters.Description: Rate charged for this car rental

parameters.Name: services_concierge
parameters.Description: Concierge service is available if set to true

parameters.Name: services_concierge_rate
parameters.Description: Rate charged for this concierge service

parameters.Name: disabled

parameters.Name: instant_booking
parameters.Description: Whether the property supports instant confirmation via webhooks. Setting to `true` will only have effect if the account has properly set up the required webhooks.

methods.Synopsis: Get the availability and rate data for a property for a certain period of time as defined by the start_date and end_date parameters, or for the upcoming year by default

parameters.Name: end_date
parameters.Description: End date of the period to query on (defaults to a year from yesterday if not specified)

parameters.Description: ISO 8601 (YYYY-MM-DD) format date or Unix time in seconds. Adding this parameter will only return records updated after this time.

parameters.Description: Output format as JSON or XML

methods.Synopsis: Set availability and rate data for a certain property for a range of dates

parameters.Description: Date of availability in ISO 8601 format (eg. 2011-10-24)

parameters.Description: Start date of availability in ISO 8601 format (eg. 2011-10-24)

parameters.Name: end_date
parameters.Description: End date of availability in ISO 8601 format (eg. 2011-10-24)

parameters.Name: available
parameters.Description: Is the property available on this date (no change if not set)

parameters.Name: nightly_rate
parameters.Description: Set the nightly rate for this date (no change if not set)

parameters.Name: weekly_rate
parameters.Description: Set the weekly rate for this date (no change if not set)

parameters.Name: monthly_rate
parameters.Description: Set the monthly rate for this date (no change if not set)

parameters.Name: can_checkin
parameters.Description: Can check in on this date

parameters.Name: can_checkout
parameters.Description: Can check out on this date

parameters.Name: minimum_stay
parameters.Description: A guest can stay at minimum number of days for these dates

parameters.Description: Output format as JSON or XML

methods.Synopsis: Allows the guest to check-in and release the payment to the host. This can bypass the host having to enter the payment code. You can only check in on or after the inquiry start date.

parameters.Name: format
parameters.Description: Output format as JSON or XML

methods.Synopsis: Make a payment for an inquiry by credit card over the API. PLEASE NOTE: CREDIT CARD NUMBER MUST BE ENCRYPTED. DO NOT SEND CLEARTEXT CREDIT CARD NUMBERS. Please see the Braintree client side encryption library of examples of how the data should be encrypted (https://github.com/braintree/braintree_client_side_encryption). The Roomorama public key is: 

parameters.Name: amount
parameters.Description: Amount of the payment to make. This must correspond to the amount to be paid or the call will return an error

parameters.Name: currency
parameters.Description: Currency of the payment. At the moment only USD payments are supported so please refer to the total_in_usd field of the inquiry for the amount to be paid

parameters.Name: card[first_name]
parameters.Description: First name on the credit card

parameters.Name: card[last_name]
parameters.Description: Last name on the credit card

parameters.Name: card[address]
parameters.Description: Billing address of the credit card

parameters.Name: card[number]
parameters.Description: Encrypted credit card number. DO NOT PASS IN CLEAR CREDIT CARD NUMBERS

parameters.Name: card[exp_month]
parameters.Description: Expiry month of the credit card

parameters.Name: card[exp_year]
parameters.Description: Expiry year of the credit card

parameters.Name: card[ccv]
parameters.Description: Encrypted credit card CCV code. DO NOT PASS IN CLEAR CREDIT CARD CCV CODES

parameters.Name: format
parameters.Description: Output format as JSON or XML

methods.Synopsis: Allows the guest to create a review to the host.
